name: @ferrugemjs/v3rtigo
description: state management library for ferrugemjs applications

scripts.compile:commonjs: tsc --module commonjs --target es5 --lib es6 --declaration true --outDir dist/commonjs src/store.ts
scripts.copy:js: npm run copy:js:amd && npm run copy:js:commonjs
scripts.build: npm run del:dist && npm run compile:tpl && npm run compile:amd && npm run compile:commonjs && npm run copy:js
scripts.test: npm run del:dist && npm run compile:tpl && npm run compile:amd && node example/test
